job.title: Senior Cloud Data Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtPosition  Titleltugtltstronggt Senior Cloud Data EngineerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPretium ltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtPretium is a specialized alternative investment manager focused on real estate and credit The Firm was founded in 2012 to capitalize on secular investment and lending opportunities that arose after the Global Financial Crisis as a result of structural changes within the economy the residential housing sector and mortgage finance markets The Firm currently manages 20 billion of AUM across its singlefamily rental 127 billion and mortgage credit 42 billion strategies as well as 32 billion of AUM in Structured and Corporate CreditltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtPosition ltugtltstronggtWe are seeking a Senior Cloud Data Engineer in data on S3ltligt ltligtCollaborate and influence stakeholders to ensure our data infrastructure meets constantly evolving requirementsltligt ltligtWork closely with data analysts to productionize applications and financial reportsltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt3 years building cloud solutions in AWSltligt ltligt5 years experience with SQL databasesltligt ltligt7 years experience as software engineer with breadth of experience that covers software development database administration and devopsltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtAWS Associate Level Certificationsltligt ltligtExperience with Athena Glue Redshift spectrum and other AWS analyticsltligt ltligtExpert at SQL OfferltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThis position offers the opportunity to join a collegial entrepreneurial firm committed to the personal and professional growth of its team members and to maintaining a
